definition: The term refers to the top professional football league in Germany, consisting of multiple teams competing against each other in a season-long tournament. It is commonly used to describe the highest level of football competition in the country, attracting significant attention from fans and media alike.

examples.german: Die Bundesliga ist die höchste Spielklasse im deutschen Fußball.
examples.english: The Bundesliga is the highest division in German football.

examples.german: Der FC Bayern München ist der Rekordmeister der Bundesliga.
examples.english: FC Bayern Munich is the record champion of the Bundesliga.

examples.german: Die Bundesliga-Saison dauert in der Regel von August bis Mai.
examples.english: The Bundesliga season usually lasts from August to May.
